items.summary: Pat Cummins will miss the T20 World Cup after failing to recover from his back injury, while Steve Smith, fresh from a blistering BBL cameo, isn't named in Australia's final 15-man squad.

items.title: Why is my migraine worse in summer?

items.title: Myanmar election won by military-backed party in widely condemned poll marred by violence
items.summary: The military's political party wins the vote in a result regarded as a forgone conclusion, with critics arguing threats and violence forced people to the ballot box in a country wracked by civil war.

items.title: Tyra Banks's 'hot ice cream' went viral. Don't expect to see it called that anymore
items.summary: Reviews have said it "tasted like soggy biscuits" and was "a weird sensation to sip through a straw". Taste aside, something bugged me. How can you call something ice cream if it's not iced?

items.title: Why Asian countries are joining Trump's Board of Peace
items.summary: Analysts say Asian countries such as Indonesia and Vietnam have signalled support for US President Donald Trump's new Board of Peace, not because they expect changes in Gaza, but to gain access to US trade.

items.title: First Nations people say 'silence' on alleged Perth bomb attack weighs heavily

items.title: Darwin Lord Mayor Peter Styles says NT Electoral Commission lost his election donations disclosure information
